DataElement.preferredName: Colon or Rectum Neuroendocrine Tumor American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) Edition 7 Clinical Regional Lymph Node N Stage
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Extent of the regional lymph node involvement for the colon or rectum neuroendocrine tumor based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined prior to treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Neoplasm Clinical N Stage
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A neoplasm with neuroendocrine differentiation that arises from the colon or rectum.  It includes well differentiated neuroendocrine tumors (low and intermediate grade) and poorly differentiated neuroendocrine carcinomas (high grade)._Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation. The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._One criteria of the TNM staging system.  N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A neoplasm with neuroendocrine differentiation that arises from the colon or rectum.  It includes well differentiated neuroendocrine tumors (low and intermediate grade) and poorly differentiated neuroendocrine carcinomas (high grade).

Concepts.definition: A neoplasm with neuroendocrine differentiation that arises from the colon or rectum. It includes neuroendocrine tumors (well-differentiated neuroendocrine neoplasms) and neuroendocrine carcinomas (poorly differentiated neuroendocrine neoplasms).

Property.preferredDefinition: Having to do with the examination and treatment of patients.:One criteria of the TMN staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
One criteria of the TNM staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: AJCC Based:Staging Criteria Based on American Joint Committee on Cancer System
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created per request by COG for their APEC14B1 study in Rave. mc 8/25/15

ValueDomain.preferredName: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Neoplasm American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) Edition 7 N Stage
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A neoplasm with neuroendocrine differentiation that arises from the colon or rectum.  It includes well differentiated neuroendocrine tumors (low and intermediate grade) and poorly differentiated neuroendocrine carcinomas (high grade)._A group formed for the purpose of developing a system of clinical staging for cancer that is acceptable to the American medical profession and is compatible with other accepted classifications._One criteria of the TNM staging system.  N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement._The extent of a cancer in the body. Staging is usually based on the size of the tumor, whether lymph nodes contain cancer, and whether the cancer has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Colon or Rectum Neuroendocrine Tumor pN0 TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Colon or Rectum Neuroendocrine Tumor pN0 TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Colon or rectum neuroendocrine tumor with no regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Colon or Rectum Neuroendocrine Tumor pN0 TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Colon or rectum neuroendocrine tumor with no regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Colon or Rectum Neuroendocrine Tumor pN1 TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Colon or Rectum Neuroendocrine Tumor pN1 TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Colon or rectum neuroendocrine tumor with regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Colon or Rectum Neuroendocrine Tumor pN1 TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Colon or rectum neuroendocrine tumor with regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Colon or Rectum Neuroendocrine Tumor pNX TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Colon or Rectum Neuroendocrine Tumor pNX TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Colon or rectum neuroendocrine tumor in which regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Colon or Rectum Neuroendocrine Tumor pNX TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Colon or rectum neuroendocrine tumor in which regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)
